title: El paradigma del marketing digital en la academia, el emprendimiento universitario y las empresas establecidas. (arXiv:2308.02969v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: The updating required by students in the marketing area is of utmost importance, since they cannot wait until they are professionals to be updated, especially in entrepreneurship and around digital marketing. The objective of this work was to develop a digital marketing specialty module that allows changing the academic-entrepreneurial-entrepreneurial paradigm of the graduate of the Centro Universitario de los Altos (CUAltos) in economic-administrative sciences at the undergraduate, graduate and specialty levels. The module aims to instruct the student in the latest in digital marketing. As part of this, two surveys were applied to the teachers of this center to know the viability and willingness to participate in this module. Among the results, it was discovered that marketing research specialists who work as teachers at CUAltos are willing to train other teachers and students of the University of Guadalajara's system, as well as to advise students in their ventures so that they can a

Title: El paradigma del marketing digital en la academia, el emprendimiento universitario y las empresas establecidas. (arXiv:2308.02969v1 [econ.GN])
Abstract: The updating required by students in the marketing area is of utmost importance, since they cannot wait until they are professionals to be updated, especially in entrepreneurship and around digital marketing. The objective of this work was to develop a digital marketing specialty module that allows changing the academic-entrepreneurial-entrepreneurial paradigm of the graduate of the Centro Universitario de los Altos (CUAltos) in economic-administrative sciences at the undergraduate, graduate and specialty levels. The module aims to instruct the student in the latest in digital marketing. As part of this, two surveys were applied to the teachers of this center to know the viability and willingness to participate in this module. Among the results, it was discovered that marketing research specialists who work as teachers at CUAltos are willing to train other teachers and students of the University of Guadalajara's system, as well as to advise students in their ventures so that they can a
translated_title: 在学术界、大学创业和已建立的企业中的数字营销范式
translated_abstract: 学生在营销领域的更新需求至关重要，因为他们不能等到成为专业人士才进行更新，特别是在创业和数字营销领域。本研究的目标是开发一个数字营销专业模块，以改变Centro Universitario de los Altos（CUAltos）经济管理科学本科、研究生和专业水平研究生的学术-创业-企业范式。该模块旨在教授学生最新的数字营销知识。作为其中的一部分，对该中心的教师进行了两次调查，以了解参与该模块的可行性和意愿。结果显示，在CUAltos担任教师的营销研究专家愿意培训其他教师和学生，以及指导学生的创业事业，以便他们可以...
tldr: 本研究旨在开发一个数字营销专业模块，以改变学术-创业-企业的范式，并教授学生最新的数字营销知识。调查结果显示，在CUAltos担任教师的营销研究专家愿意培训其他教师和学生，并指导学生的创业事业。
en_tdlr: This study aims to develop a digital marketing specialty module to change the academic-entrepreneurial-entrepreneurial paradigm and teach students the latest in digital marketing. The survey results showed that marketing research specialists at CUAltos are willing to train other teachers and students, and advise students in their entrepreneurial ventures.
